form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Lee (for himself, Mr. Scott of Florida, and Mrs. Blackburn) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To repeal the District of Columbia Home Rule Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Bringing Oversight to Washington and Safety to Every Resident Act or the BOWSER Act.

section.header: Repeal of District of Columbia Home Rule Act
section.text: Effective on the date that is 1 year after the date of enactment of this Act, the District of Columbia Home Rule Act (Public Law 93â€“198; 87 Stat. 774) is repealed.
